caption.title: Genetic diversity parameters at 26 nuclear SSR markers for 16 populations of Ambrosia artemisiifolia.
caption.p: N: number of individuals genotyped, A: average allelic richness after rarefaction, H O observed heterozygosity, H S expected heterozygosity, F IS inbreeding coefficient estimated taking into account the presence of null alleles. * F IS estimates significantly greater from zero (using the Bayesian model comparison based on Deviance Information Criterion implemented in INEST2.1).
Click here for additional data file.
